instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 problems
threads.message:
820-3115-B with no fan spin. green light on charger.

PPBUS_G3H is 12.52v

threads.title: 820-3115 problems
threads.message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

You need to post some more information.
Do you get 3V3_S5/SUS?
Whay about PM_BATLOW_L?
Are you using 60/85W original charger?

threads.title: 820-3115 problems
threads.message:
Thank you! I am using the 60w this is a 13" board.

PP3V3_S3 not present
PP3V3_SUS not present
PP3V3_S5 not present
PM_BATLOW_L not present

threads.title: 820-3115 problems
threads.message:
PCH cannot start power on sequence without PM_BATLOW_L.
Check SMC_PM_G2_EN.

threads.title: 820-3115 problems
threads.message:
16 is 0v
13 is 2.99v
3 is 0v
8 is 0v
17 is .03v
6 is 0v

threads.title: 820-3115 problems
threads.message:
You've said PPBUS_G3H is good.
Check why doesn't arrive to U7201...

threads.title: 820-3115 problems
threads.message: so i am i just checking for a short to ground?

threads.title: 820-3115 problems
threads.message:
PPBUS_G3H must arrive to pin 16/U7201.
Broken trace???
